post.text: The Central Park Five were exonerated. What does it say about Trump that he thinks they should still be in prison?

comment.author: Ashley
comment.text: We prefer to live in a shining city on the hill. Hillary and her cohorts have been shoving us down the hill and into a dark sewer in the gulch. Whether we are white, black, brown, yellow, or red, we are tired of living in Hillary's sewer. We will all continue to be sorrowfully blue if we continue to be blue..... Let's do something about it come election day.

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: Move away then...or deal with it, because it's going to be HRC.

replies.author: Sean
replies.text: Women, Blacks & Latinos aren't as brainwashed as Hillary Clinton and @TheDemocrats believe. #WomenForTrump #LatinosForTrump #BlacksForTrump

replies.author: Steven
replies.text: Trump represents the danger for USA and the whole world . Trump is unfit to have the control of the nuclear arsenal.
